name: Ethix-MD-V2
description: I am Ethix-MD, a WhatsApp MultiDevice Bot built in NodeJs to enhance your whatsapp experience

SESSION_ID.description: Your session id. Must Start with Ethix

MODE.description: set Mode  to public or private

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Make it true if you want bot to view status

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: make it true if you want the bot to send message after viewing status

STATUS_READ_MSG.description: set your status reply message to be sent after bot views status

AUTO_READ.description: Make it true if you want bot to read messages

AUTO_TYPING.description: Make it true if you want bot to show typing

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Make it true if you want bot to show recording audio

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Make it true if you want bot to show always online

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Make it true if you want bot to auto block only 212 numbers

REJECT_CALL.description: Make it true if you want to automatically reject calls
